stories.Title: Inflection wants to take the stage
stories.Description: While its ability to outperform rivals is yet to be seen, Inflection-1, the language model behind Pi chatbot, showcases Inflection's commitment to the AI landscape.
stories.Tweet: Inflection wants to take the stage 📦 While its ability to outperform rivals is yet to be seen, Inflection-1, the language model behind Pi chatbot, showcases Inflection's commitment to the AI landscape. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/22/inflection-debuts-its-own-foundation-ai-model-to-rival-google-and-openai-llms/

stories.Title: Stable Diffusion defies its biggest enemy
stories.Description: The upcoming release of Stable Diffusion's SDXL 0.9 brings improvements in photorealism and tackles a significant challenge: generating convincing hands.
stories.Tweet: Stable Diffusion defies its biggest enemy 📦 The upcoming release of Stable Diffusion's SDXL 0.9 brings improvements in photorealism and tackles a significant challenge: generating convincing hands. #ai https://www.engadget.com/the-next-version-of-stable-diffusion-wont-produce-spaghetti-hands-171552952.html

stories.Title: AI as a catalyst for creativity
stories.Description: Don't let the fear of AI taking away our capabilities overshadow the opportunities it presents, as it can actually be a powerful ally in amplifying our creative potential.
stories.Tweet: AI as a catalyst for creativity 📦 Don't let the fear of AI taking away our capabilities overshadow the opportunities it presents, as it can actually be a powerful ally in amplifying our creative potential. #ai https://time.com/6289278/ai-affect-human-creativity/

stories.Title: US moves toward AI regulation
stories.Description: In order to develop guidance and regulations around this powerful technology, the Commerce Department has announced the establishment of a public working group.
stories.Tweet: US moves toward AI regulation 📦 In order to develop guidance and regulations around this powerful technology, the Commerce Department has announced the establishment of a public working group. #ai https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-launch-working-group-generative-ai-address-its-risks-2023-06-22/

stories.Title: Amazon’s bold move
stories.Description: AWS is launching the Generative AI Innovation Center, an AI sandbox and tutoring service that empowers customers to build and deploy their own generative AI products.
stories.Tweet: Amazon’s bold move 📦 AWS is launching the Generative AI Innovation Center, an AI sandbox and tutoring service that empowers customers to build and deploy their own generative AI products. #amazon https://www.axios.com/2023/06/23/amazon-generative-ai-playground-opens

stories.Title: Introducing: AudioPaLM
stories.Description: By combining PaLM-2 and AudioLM, this language model effortlessly handles both text and speech, delivering unrivaled speech translation and voice transfer across languages.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: AudioPaLM 📦 By combining PaLM-2 and AudioLM, this language model effortlessly handles both text and speech, delivering unrivaled speech translation and voice transfer across languages.  #ai https://google-research.github.io/seanet/audiopalm/examples/

stories.Title: Advancements with Precision
stories.Description: With an impressive first-in-human clinical study, Precision Neuroscience embarks on a remarkable journey as it delves into the intricacies of human thought with its neural implant system.
stories.Tweet: Advancements with Precision 📦 With an impressive first-in-human clinical study, Precision Neuroscience embarks on a remarkable journey as it delves into the intricacies of human thought with its neural implant system. #science https://www.cnbc.com/2023/06/23/precision-a-neuralink-competitor-conducts-its-first-clinical-study.html

stories.Title: Building the path to Artemis 2
stories.Description: Engineers alongside NASA's Exploration Ground Systems Program are working tirelessly to restore Launch Pad 39B, ensuring it is ready for the monumental Artemis 2 mission.
stories.Tweet: Building the path to Artemis 2 📦 Engineers alongside NASA's Exploration Ground Systems Program are working tirelessly to restore Launch Pad 39B, ensuring it is ready for the monumental Artemis 2 mission. #NASA https://gizmodo.com/nasa-progresses-sls-pad-repairs-upgrades-artemis-2-1850565244

stories.Title: India says yes to NASA
stories.Description: India has officially joined the Artemis Accords, fostering global partnerships in space exploration through international cooperation, shared advancements, and knowledge exchange.
stories.Tweet: India says yes to NASA 📦 India has officially joined the Artemis Accords, fostering global partnerships in space exploration through international cooperation, shared advancements, and knowledge exchange. #NASA https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/22/india-nasa-artemis-accords/

stories.Title: Volkswagen's approach to affordability
stories.Description: The automaker aims to bring more affordable electric vehicles to the masses by focusing on new battery technology, cheaper materials, and streamlined production.
stories.Tweet: Volkswagen's approach to affordability 📦 The automaker aims to bring more affordable electric vehicles to the masses by focusing on new battery technology, cheaper materials, and streamlined production. #volkswagen https://electrek.co/2023/06/23/volkswagen-confident-affordable-ev-under-27k/

stories.Title: Get ready for the iPhone 15
stories.Description: The iPhone 15 is packed with exciting new features, including a lighter build thanks to titanium bands. Maybe it's time to consider saying goodbye to your old device.
stories.Tweet: Get ready for the iPhone 15 📦 The iPhone 15 is packed with exciting new features, including a lighter build thanks to titanium bands. Maybe it's time to consider saying goodbye to your old device. #iphone https://9to5mac.com/2023/06/22/time-to-buy-iphone-15/
